tg.t: with the stern of a boat overloaded
with the back end overloaded (of a sledge, car)
shows the suddenness of an action
(of the sound of water, of diving into smth loose)
(sound of poured water, sound of splashing into water)
with a ripping or tearing sound
in the midst of hay stacking time

xg.xt: totally blind, he doesn't see a thing

tg.t: with a full sweep of one's arm
with a full sweep of one's arm
from the direction of the sea
(of quick movement, s4urk is slightly slower)
(type of harrow made with (chain) links in graduated levels)
(äestyyppi, joka on tehty ketjulinkit asteittaisessa muodostelmassa)
(of a very quick movement: fly, rise, run)

xg.xt: he jumped up with a start
